trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE2_00555_CULINARIAN00519_000_000<tab>It's hardly a surprise with all this watery aether, but the air here is so full of moisture. <sigh> I suppose now I'll need to keep an eye out for mold. Keeping food fresh was never an issue in the colder regions...

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE2_00555_CULINARIAN00519_000_010<tab>Sealed away the primal, did they? Good for them. Scholars and heroes perform great deeds, but my place is here at the pot. Filling empty bellies with nourishing dishes is an epic undertaking all of its own in an environment such as this...
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE2_00555_CULINARIAN00519_000_020<tab>So, that's the end of the expedition, is it? Maybe I can invent a new flavor of stew to celebrate the occasion!
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE2_00555_CULINARIAN00519_000_030<tab>The expedition draws to a close, but the mood in the camp is grim. Maybe a light and tasty dish will aid in lifting this oppressive pall...

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE2_00555_CULINARIAN00519_000_040<tab>Whatever happened within that tower, all I know is that it signals the end of the expedition. The time has come to prepare my most sumptuous creation, and restore the bodies of our weary explorers!
